episodes.synopsis: Follow investigators to a mountaintop monastery in search of clues about the authenticity of a cup some believe to be the Holy Grail.
episodes.title: The Holy Grail & The Labyrinth

episodes.synopsis: Experts trace the blood-stained Shroud of Oviedo to Israel in a quest to determine whether it holds Christ's DNA.
episodes.title: The Blood of Christ & The Phaistos Disc

episodes.synopsis: Scholars have uncovered a handwritten manuscript by one of the greatest scientific minds in history, Sir Isaac Newton, that may unlock the secrets of the Philosopher's Stone.
episodes.title: Secrets of the Dark Arts & The Ark

video.title: Ancient X-Files
video.synopsis: Join intrepid investigators as they delve into some of mankind's enduring mysteries, hoping to uncover shocking secrets buried deep in the past.
